quest: During what period did the story of Ruth occur? (1)
ans: In the days when the judges ruled

quest: Who went to Moab? (2)
ans: Elimelech, his wife Naomi, and the name of his two sons Mahlon and Chilion

quest: Who was the first to die in Moab? (3)
ans: Elimelech

quest: Who did Naomi’s sons marry? (4)
ans: Orphah and Ruth

quest: What happened to these sons? (5)
ans: They died

quest: Why did Naomi decide to return from the country of Moab? (6)
ans: She heard in the country of Moab that the LORD had visited his people in giving them bread.

quest: Why did Naomi encourage her daughters-in-law to stay in Moab? (11-13)
ans: She felt they had a better chance to find a husband in Moab

quest: Who went back to her people? (14)
ans: Orphah

quest: How did Ruth reply? (16-17)
ans: Entreat me not to leave you, or to return from following after you: for where you go, I will go; and where you lodge, I will lodge: your people shall be my people, and your God my God

quest: Why did Naomi want to be called Mara? (20)
ans: Because she felt the Almighty has dealt very bitterly with her.

quest: At what season did Ruth and Naomi return to Bethlehem? (22)
ans: In the beginning of barley harvest.

quest: To who was Boaz related? (1)
ans: Elimelech

quest: What did Ruth do in the field of Boaz? (2-3)
ans: Gleaned

quest: What did Boaz ask Ruth to do? (8-9)
ans: Glean in his field, and abide with his maidens

quest: What had Boaz heard about Ruth? (11)
ans: All that she had done for her mother in law since the death of her husband

quest: What did Boaz tell his young men to do? (15-16)
ans: Let Ruth glean even among the sheaves, and reproach her not: And let fall also some of the handfuls of purpose for her, and rebuke her not

quest: How long was Ruth allowed to glean in the field of Boaz? (23)
ans: To the end of barley harvest and of wheat harvest

quest: Where did Ruth lie down after Boaz fell asleep? (4-7)
ans: At the feet of Boaz

quest: What did Ruth bring to Naomi? (15-17)
ans: Six measures of barley

quest: What was the method of confirming a transfer of property? (7-8)
ans: A man plucked off his shoe, and gave it to his neighbor

quest: What did Boaz buy and acquire? (9-10)
ans: All that was Elimelech's, and all that was Chilion's and Mahlon's, and Ruth to be his wife

quest: Who was Ruth’s great-grandson? (21-22)
ans: David
